table.elementDescription: `<table>` is native element that arranges data into columns and rows, which ZingGrid can use as a data source.

members.name: data-zg-*
members.description: Sets a ZingGrid attribute (Ex. data-zg-pager corresponds to the ZingGrid[pager] attribute).

members.name: data-zg-data-format
members.description: Specifies if the grid should copy the full html value of the data rows or just the text data.

members.name: data-zg-head-format
members.description: Specifies if the grid should copy the full html value of the head row or just the text data.

members.name: id
members.description: The id of the table. Use this value in `ZingGrid[data]` to specify <table> as the data source.

members.name: is
members.description: Set to "zing-grid" to convert this <table> into a grid.

th.elementDescription: `<th>` is native element that represents a table header cell.

members.name: data-zg-frozen-column
members.description: Presence of attribute freezes the column.

tr.elementDescription: `<tr>` is native element that represents a table row.

members.name: data-zg-frozen-row
members.description: Presence of attribute freezes the row.

members.name: data-zg-head-row
members.description: Presence of attribute specifies row as a header row.

members.name: data-zg-ignore-row
members.description: Presence of attribute ignores the row.

col.elementDescription: `<col>` is native element that represents a column in a table.

members.name: data-zg-*
members.description: Sets a ZGColumn attribute (Ex. data-zg-type corresponds to the ZGColumn[type] attribute).
